General.Name: Kido Group Corp
General.Description: KIDO Group Corporation, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the manufacture and trade of food and drink products in Vietnam. The company operates through Edible Oil Business, Foods Business, and other activities segments. It offers cooking and soya oil under the Tuong An and Vocarimex brands; ice creams under the Merino and Celano brands; yogurt; desserts; and soft drinks under the Vibev brand. The company also manufactures and trades in various packaging products; vegetable fats, oils from seeds, and coconut quartz; and operates in the real estate industry. In addition, it manufactures and trades beverages, such as milk and dairy products, non-alcoholic drinks, mineral water, and frozen foods; vegetable oils; and engages in the wholesale of food products. The company was formerly knowns as Kinh Do Corporation. The company was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam.
